gpt_critique.critique: Model B's reasoning provides stronger alignment for three SDGs with course text; revisions issued accordingly.

Decent Work and Economic Growth.reason: Model B links solid business foundation to economic growth more directly with course aims.

Responsible Consumption and Production.reason: Text mentions merchandising/inventories but sustainability focus is not explicit; Model B's caution aligns with course.
